flavor: You were the youngest apprentice of an evil master, and the heroes who overthrew him saw the possibility for your redemption in the right circumstancesâ€”such as the academy. How much do you remember of your earliest lessons? Does your past haunt you, or do you secretly embrace it? Did you find like-minded individuals at the school, or are you alone in the universe? Do words in a forbidden tongue occasionally bubble to your lips?
name: Dark Apprenticeship
